Title: Delegated Dig
Description:
Okay, I know when I'm beat. So I want to hire you as my Champion of Coin... or coinchamp.

This is all a part of my brilliant enterprising venture. See, these worms here are great at rooting out rich minerals like a niffen sniffing out high-quality mushrooms. 

I'm willing to bet all of my money--and your life--that they found a vein of sivstone. Great stuff, though I doubt a $c would know how to use it. 

Tell you what, you bring me a shipment's worth and I'll go halfsies on the profits with ya!
RewardText:
Nice haul! This should get us started back in Mmarl and show those goons who's who. 

Here's your cut.
